name: Pasta-Xpress
location: Sector 11, Dwarka, Sector 12, Dwarka, New Delhi.
address: G - 35,Manish Market, Pocket-2,Sector - 11, Sector 11, Dwarka, New Delhi, New Delhi
description: Pasta Xpress is a F&B-Casual Dining outlet that offers a wide variety of Italian-inspired dishes. The menu features a selection of pastas, pizzas, salads, and sandwiches, as well as a variety of desserts. The atmosphere is relaxed and inviting, with a focus on providing a comfortable and enjoyable dining experience. The staff is friendly and attentive, and the prices are reasonable. Whether you're looking for a quick bite or a leisurely meal, Pasta Xpress is the perfect spot for a delicious Italian-style meal.
